title: The Advisory Adventures of Frank Brown
summary: Frank Brown, a 52-year-old advisor, discovers his latent power of premonition and uses it to advise and protect his community over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Frank Brown, ein 52-jähriger Berater, entdeckt seine verborgene Fähigkeit der Vorahnung und nutzt sie, um seiner Gemeinde eine Woche lang Rat und Schutz zu bieten.
summaryDutch: Frank Brown, een 52-jarige adviseur, ontdekt zijn latente kracht van voorspelling en gebruikt deze om zijn gemeenschap gedurende een week te adviseren en te beschermen.
summaryFrench: Frank Brown, un conseiller de 52 ans, découvre son pouvoir latent de prévoyance et l'utilise pour conseiller et protéger sa communauté pendant une semaine.

story.text: Frank discovers his unexpected power of premonition when he successfully advises his neighbor to avoid a bad investment.
He uses his new abilities to predict a minor car accident, helping a friend take a safer route to work.
His powers grow stronger, leading him to a lost child in the park, bringing relief and joy to a worried family.
A disturbing vision of a local crisis puts Frank on edge. He spends the day preparing, gathering community support.
The crisis arrives: a fire in a nearby building. Equipped with his foresight, Frank organizes an efficient evacuation.
Reflecting on his week, Frank understands the responsibility and burden of his powers, advising himself to be cautious.
Ending the week, Frank holds a community meeting to discuss safety improvements, earning their trust and gratitude.

moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and using one's abilities to help others brings the greatest rewards.
